reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 626/00: SMALL CLAIMS COURT JURISDICTION AND APPEAL LIMIT
reg_info.reg_name_text: SMALL CLAIMS COURT JURISDICTION AND APPEAL LIMIT

content.content: 1. (1) The maximum amount of a claim in the Small Claims Court is $35,000.  O. Reg. 626/00, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 439/08, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 343/19, s. 1. (2) The maximum amount of a claim over which a deputy judge may preside is $35,000.  O. Reg. 626/00, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 439/08, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 343/19, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The maximum amount of a claim in the Small Claims Court is $35,000.  O. Reg. 626/00, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 439/08, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 343/19, s. 1.

(2) The maximum amount of a claim over which a deputy judge may preside is $35,000.  O. Reg. 626/00, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 439/08, s. 1 (2); O. Reg. 343/19, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) For the purposes of clause 31 (a) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $3,500.  O. Reg. 317/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 343/19, s. 2. (2) For the purposes of clause 31 (b) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $3,500.  O. Reg. 317/11, s. 1 O. Reg. 343/19, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) For the purposes of clause 31 (a) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $3,500.  O. Reg. 317/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 343/19, s. 2.

(2) For the purposes of clause 31 (b) of the Act, the prescribed amount is $3,500.  O. Reg. 317/11, s. 1 O. Reg. 343/19, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 626/00, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 626/00, s. 3.
